Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand will definitely have the upper hand over Sri Lanka before they take the field at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.
The Blackcaps will have to be at their absolute best to get the better of the Lankan Lions, who would want to secure their spot in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 too.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitches at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru for the ODI World Cup 2023 have provided the batters the opportunity to post big totals on the board consistently.
The average first-innings score of 265 is something that both New Zealand and Sri Lanka will fancy to get past on November 9.
Others: The string of losses for the Blackcaps have derailed their CWC 2023 campaign, while the Lankan Lions have been far from their best in the flagship tournament as well.
